_header: Holly and Ivy made a great party [Holver and Heivy made a grete party]

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Holvyr & heyvy mad a gret partyHo xuld haue þe
                    mayst…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines: …I prey þe jentyl heyvysey me no veleny
